original_title: Air traffic controllers to launch work-to-rule campaign from noon today
original_body_lines: Air traffic controllers have decided to launch a work-to-rule campaign from noon today, Sri Lanka Air Traffic Controllers Association Secretary Rajitha Senviratne said.
"We have decided to launch the work to rule campaign to support all trade unions who have launched a general strike today," Senaviratne said. (Yohan Perera)
